data.comment: Cardiff kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Will Vaulks is booked for the away team.
In the minute 25, Sean Morrison scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 1-0 at bet365 Stadium.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Stoke have kicked-off the second half at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 55, Sam Vokes (Stoke) has replaced the possibly injured Tyrese Campbell.
Stoke have been given a penalty...
Sam Vokes (Stoke) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 60, It seems as if Harry Wilson is unable to continue. Robert Glatzel replaces him for the away team.
Tommy Smith (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Robert Glatzel levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 66, Great play from Joe Ralls to set up the goal.
Ryan Shawcross is replacing Jacob Brown for Stoke at bet365 Stadium.
James McClean (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Tony Harrington.
In the minute 76, Cardiff move into a 1-2 lead through a Sean Morrison header.
Joe Ralls with an assist there.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at bet365 Stadium with Marlon Pack replacing Joe Ralls.
In the minute 80, Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a third substitution, with Gavin Whyte replacing Mark Harris.
The home team have replaced Josh Tymon with Tashan Oakley-Boothe. This is the third substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Tom Ince is replacing Tommy Smith for Stoke at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Kieffer Moore with Souleymane Bamba. This is the fourth substitution made today by Neil Harris.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Cardiff's Sheyi Ojo has been booked in Stoke.
